Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Member of the editorial board of the International Economics Letter Journal as from 2012. http://www.ielettters.cz/

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: INVITED: 'Tre pilastri per un progetto di integrazione' (with E. Moretti) SIEDS – Società Italiana di Economia, Demografia e Statistica [Italian Society of Economics, Demography and Statistics] Annual International Conference on ‘Geopolitics of the Mediterranean’, 29-31 May 2008, Bari, Italy.
AS PRESENTER: 'Migration, Remittances and Development' AISP, Giornate di Studio sulla Popolazione, Milan, 2-4 February 2009.

AS PRESENTER: 'A case study of multilevel governance on migration policies' (with Elena Ambrosetti) IUSSP Conference on ‘The Policy Use of Quantitative and Qualitative Indicators of Integration’, INED – Institut National D’Etudes Démographiques, Paris, 25-26 May 2009.

AS PRESENTER: 'Living here, investing here and there: migratory projects and remittances. Theory and evidence from a case study' (with Eros Moretti) 26th IUSSP International Population Conference, Marrakech, Morocco, 27 September - 2 October 2009.

INVITED: 'Economic and cultural integration of immigrants: results of a survey in the urban area of Ancona' (with E. Moretti) Conference on ‘Population, Development and Environment in the Mediterranean and Latin America’, 12-13 October 2009, Gargano, Italy.

AS PRESENTER: 'Migration, remittances and cooperation: a study case of Senegalese migrants in the Marche region' SIEDS – Società Italiana di Economia, Demografia e Statistica, 67th Annual International Conference, Milan, 27-29 May 2010.

AS PRESENTER: 'Migrations et relations intergénérationnelles en Albania' (with Elena Ambrosetti and Ilir Gedeshi) 16th Colloque International de l’Aidelf, on ‘Relations Interegénérationnelles Enjeux Démographiques’, Université de Genève, 21-24 June 2010.

AS PRESENTER: 'Migration, remittances and inter-generational relationships: a case study from Albania' (with Elena Ambrosetti and Ilir Gedeshi) EAPS, European Population Conference, Vienna, 1-4 September 2010.

AS PRESENTER: 'The determinants of remittances: a comparison between theoretical and empirical results' Workshop ‘Migration and Remittances: Identity, Consumption and Investments’, Parma (Italy), 30 September – 1 October 2010.

AS PRESENTER: 'Remittances and power relations: a case study from Albania' (with Elena Ambrosetti and Ilir Gedeshi) TRANSMIG conference on Transnationalism and Migration, Stockholm, 4- 5 November 2010.
AS PRESENTER: 'Brain Drain: a case study from Albania' (with Elena Ambrosetti, Cinzia Castagnaro and Ilir Gedeshi) Workshop “Migration and Education”, INED, Paris, 17-18 December 2010.
AS PRESENTER: 'L’impatto delle rimesse nello sviluppo socio: economico delle aree di partenza degli immigrati' AISP, Giornate di Studio sulla Popolazione, Ancona, 1-4 February 2011.

AS PRESENTER: 'The remittances behaviour of the second generation in Europe: altruism or self-interest?' (with Elena Ambrosetti and Tineke Fokkema) International Conference ‘The Migration-Development Nexus Revisited: State of the Art and Ways Ahead’, Trento University, (Italy), 8-10 June 2011.

AS PRESENTER: 'La Dolce Vita: integration patterns of migrants in Italy' (with Elena Ambrosetti and Tineke Fokkema) PAA annual meeting, Session 164: ‘International perspectives on integration and assimilation’, San Francisco, 3-5 May 2012.

AS PRESENTER: 'Percorsi di integrazione degli immigrati in Italia tra teoria e pratica' (with Tineke Fokkema and Elena Ambrosetti) SIEDS – Società Italiana di Economia, Demografia e Statistica, San Benedetto del Tronto, 24-26 May 2012.

AS PRESENTER: 'Variation in transnationalism among Eastern European migrants in Italy' (with Tineke Fokkema and Elena Ambrosetti) IMISCOE Conference on ‘Migration, transnationalism and development in the Balkans and South-East Europe’, Amsterdam, 29 August 2012.

AS PRESENTER: The role of migrant status on transnational ties: The case of migrants in Italy (with Elena Ambrosetti and Tineke Fokkema) Workshop ‘Migrant Transnationalism, Integration and Return’, Erasmus University, Rotterdam, 25-26 October 2012.

AS PRESENTER: 'The role of legal status on transnationalism: the case of migrants in Italy' (with Tineke Fokkema and Elena Ambrosetti) Interdisciplinary conference on ‘Migration, Global Development, New Frontiers’, organised by the NORFACE Research Programme on Migration and the Centre for Research and Analysis of Migration (CReAM) at University College London, 10-13 April 2013.

AS PRESENTER: 'Arab uprising and return intensions of Egyptian migrants living in two Italian cities' (with Viviana Premazzi, Elena Ambrosetti and Tineke Fokkema) IUSSP conference on ‘International Migration in the Middle East and North Africa after the Arab Uprising: A Long Term Perspective’, Cairo, Egypt, 22-23 April 2013.

AS PRESENTER: How to cope with loneliness in a foreign country? A qualitative study among Albanian and Moroccan older migrants in Italy (with Tineke Fokkema) SIEDS – Società Italiana di Economia, Demografia e Statistica [Italian Society of Economics, Demography, and Statistics] Annual International Conference, Rome, 28-30 May 2013.

AS PRESENTER: Gendered remittances of Romanians in Italy (with Eros Moretti) SIEDS – Società Italiana di Economia, Demografia e Statistica [Italian Society of Economics, Demography, and Statistics] Annual International Conference, Rome, (Italy), 28-30 May 2013.
AS PRESENTER: The role of migrant status on transnational ties: the case of migrants in Italy (with Tineke Fokkema and Elena Ambrosetti) 10th IZA Annual Migration Meeting, Jerusalem, 2-7 June 2013.

AS PRESENTER: 'How to cope with loneliness in a foreign country? A qualitative study among Albanian and Moroccan older migrants in Italy' (with Tineke Fokkema) 10th IMISCOE Annual Conference on ‘Crisis and Migration: Perceptions, Challenges and Consequences’, Malmö Institute for Studies of Migration, Diversity and Welfare (MIM), Sweden, 25-27 August 2013.

AS PRESENTER: 'Should I stay or should I go? How the Arab Spring and economic crisis affected return intentions?' (with Elena Ambrosetti, Tineke Fokkema and Viviana Premazzi) 27th IUSSP International Population Conference, Busan, Republic of Korea, 26-31 August 2013.

AS PRESENTER: 'Elderly on the move: a nuanced view on pendular migration among older migrants in Italy' (with Tineke Fokkema) IS Academy final Conference on ‘Migration and Development: A World in Motion’, Maastricht University, 22-24 January 2014.

AS PRESENTER: 'Feeling lonely in a foreign country: prevalence, causes, and copying strategies of older migrants. Evidence from Italy' (with Tineke Fokkema) 5th European Conference on Migrant and Ethnic Minority Health, EUPHA, Andalusian School of Public Health, Granada, Spain, 10-12 April 2014.

AS PRESENTER: 'Why are older migrants more lonely? Quantitative and qualitative evidence' (with Tineke Fokkema) IMISCOE International Conference, CesNova, New University of Lisbon, Portugal, 15-16 May 2014.

ORGANISATION: International Conference: “Wellbeing in an ageing Europe: comparisons between ageing migrants and natives” – organized by Eralba Cela, Oana Ciobanu, Angeles Escrivá, Tineke Fokkema & Mihaela Nedelcu (CesNova, New University of Lisbon, Portugal, 15-16 May 2014).

INVITED: 'Migration in the Mediterranean' (with E. Moretti) SIEDS – Società Italiana di Economia, Demografia e Statistica, Annual International Conference on ‘Population, Development and the Environment: The Case of the Mediterranean’, 29-31 May 2014, Naples, Italy.

AS PRESENTER: 'Who cares for the caregiver? Expected and actual support in later-life migrant families' (with Tineke Fokkema) 11th IMISCOE Annual Conference, Research Panel ‘Care arrangements for ageing migrants at the intersection between public, private, third sector and the family’, Madrid, 27-29 August 2014.

AS PRESENTER: 'The migration and wellbeing of the zero generation: transgenerational care, grandparenting and loneliness amongst Albanian older people' (with Russell King, Tineke Fokkema and Juli Vullnetari) Royal Geographical Society with the Institute of British Geographer (RGS/IBG), Annual International Conference, London, 28 August 2014.

AS PRESENTER: 'Research on Transnational Care. An Attempt to Bridge the Qualitative-Quantitative Divide' (with Oana Ciobanu and Tineke Fokkema) Conference “Transnational Migration: Disciplinary Impacts”, 29-30 January 2015 at MIM and GPS, Malmö University.
POSTER: 'Ageing in a multicultural Europe: perspectives and challenges' Population Days Palermo 4 - 6 February 2015.
INVITED: 'Ageing Migrants: Studying by Comparing' IMISCOE International Conference: 19-21 March 2015, University of Geneva.

INVITED: 'Ageing in a multicultural Europe: perspectives and challenges' European Commission and UNECE International Seminar "Building an evidence base for active ageing policies: Active Ageing Index and its potential", 16–17 April 2015, Royal Flemish Academy of Belgium for Sciences and Arts, Brussels.

AS PRESENTER: 'Migration and return migration in later life: the pendulum between subjective wellbeing and place' IMISCOE 12th Annual Conference: Return Migration and Psychosocial Wellbeing: Discourses, Policy-Making and Outcomes for Migrants and their Families, Geneva, 25-27 June 2015.
ORGANISATION: International Conference: “Quality of Life Technology – Good Practices and Funding Opportunities”, held in Ancona (Italy) on 7-8 September 2015.
A PRESENTER: 'Being lonely later in life: a qualitative study among Albanians and Moroccans in Italy' (with Tineke Fokkema) GSA Annual Scientific Meeting, 18-22 November 2015, Orlando, Florida.

INVITED: 'Recent Trends on Social Isolation and Loneliness among Older People in Italy' (with Giovanni Lamura and Maria Gabriella Melchiorre - INRCA - National Institute of Health and Science on Ageing) 21st IAGG World Congress of Gerontology and Geriatrics (IAGG 2017), July 23-27, 2017, San Francisco, California.

ORGANISER of the Research Pannel: “New frontiers for International Retirement Migration" organized by Eralba Cela, Russell King and Tineke Fokkema at IMISCOE 14th Annual Conference “Migration, Diversity and the City”, Rotterdam, 28 – 30 June 2017
INVITED: 'The ageing migration nexus' International conference ‘Methodological tools for comparative research in the field of ageing migrants’, 10 - 12 March 2016, University of Neuchâtel.

INVITED: 'Labour (in)stability of Albanian migrants in Italy over the period 2001-2015' (with Russell King, Elisa Barbiano di Belgioioso and Livia Ortensi) International conference ‘Labour Migration in the European Peripheries’, April 26-27, 2016, Jyväskylä, Finland.

INVITED: 'Later-life im)mobilities: longitudinal evidence from the German Socio-Economic Panel (GSOEP)', (with Giulia Bettin) Royal Geographical Society Annual International Conference 2016, 30 August – 2 September, London.

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Responsabilità della valutazione del programma “Youth Migration: Reaping the Benefits and Mitigating the Risks” finanziato dal Governo Spagnolo tramite il Millennium Development Goals Fund (MDGF) in supporto del Governo Albanese. L'incarico mi è stato affidato dall'ILO - International Labor Organization in qualità di esperto su migrazioni e mercato del lavoro (come da pagina 7 - 8 'Evaluation Team' e 'Competencies and Qualifications' dell'allegato).

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Professional Membership: SIEDS – Società Italiana di Economia, Demografia e Statistica.
Professional Membership: AISP –Italian Association on Population Studies.
Professional Membership: IUSSP – International Union for the Scientific Study in Population.
Premio nell'ambito del concorso 'Neoautori su Neodemos' ricevuto a Firenze il 27 marzo 2010 per l'articolo: 'Vivere qua, investire qua e là: progetti migratori e rimesse'
Professional Membership: EAPS – European Association for Population Studies.
Premio: Vincitore dello European Commission’s “Highly commended papers” Award for the paper “Ageing in a multicultural Europe: perspectives and challenges”.

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Collaborazione scientifica con il Centro di Studi Economici e Sociali di Tirana per lo svolgimento della ricerca 'The Roma migration - How to maximise its benefits'

La candidata ha effettuato nel 2016, in qualità di ricercatrice una prestazione occasionale per COOSS Marche Soc. Coop. P.A. nell'ambito del progetto Europeo "Developing and integrating the welfare system towards a welfare mix system locally managed in the Adriatic area"

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Partecipazione al progetto PRIN 2005 "Dinamica demografica e migrazioni nella regione Adriatica. Il ruolo delle comunità immigrate"
Partecipazione al progetto Europeo Interreg IIIA “SIOI – Social Integration of Immigrants”, leadpartner Università Politecnica delle Marche
Dal 2010 sonomembro del CESS - Centre for Economic and Social Sciences, un centro di ricerca dedicato allo studio dei fenomeni economici e sociali in Albania

Sono uno dei fondatori e organizzatori dello Standing Committee (SC) “Ageing Migrants: Demography, Welfare and Agency” nell’ambito della rete di eccellenza Europea IMISCOE - International Migration, Integration, Social Cohesion and Exclusion. Lo SC è rappresentato da ricercatori di diversi paesi europei con diversi background dalla demografia, sociologia, antropologia, geografia, gerontologia, con l’obiettivo di organizzare conferenze e seminari internazionali, preparare proposte progettuali, scrivere articoli congiunti. Lo SC è stato formalmente riconosciuto da IMISCOE nel 2011; a partire dal 2011 riceviamo fondi per organizzare workshop sulla tematica dell’invecchiamento degli immigrati.
Participazione al progetto Prin 'Piccoli comuni e coesione sociale: politiche e pratiche urbane per l'inclusione sociale e spaziale degli immigrati' 2010-2011
Partecipazione al progetto ‘Adriatic Model of Sustainable Mobility in the Health and Care Sector', finanziato dal programma Adriatic IPA Cross Border Cooperation Programme.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Periodo di ricerca presso INED - Institut National D'Etudes Dempgraphique

Risultati ottenuti nel trasferimento tec.content: Partecipo in qualità di socio alla società AICARE S.R.L. - start-up innovativa a vocazione sociale, costituita a novembre 2016 come risultato del progetto Adrihealthmob al quale partecipo dal 2014.
